name: @ponticus/escomplex
description: Next generation complexity reporting for Javascript & Typescript based on the Babel parser.

scripts.build-syntax: babel ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-project/src -d ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-project/dist && babel ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-module/src -d ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-module/dist && babel ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-commons/src -d ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-commons/dist && babel ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-plugin-metrics-project/src -d ./node_modules/@ponticus/escomplex-plugin-metrics-project/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-metrics-module/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-metrics-module/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-estree/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-estree/dist && babel ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-babylon/src -d ./node_modules/escomplex-plugin-syntax-babylon/dist && babel ./node_modules/typhonjs-plugin-manager/src -d ./node_modules/typhonjs-plugin-manager/dist
